short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Chrome browser extension for givvum app

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Chrome browser extension for givvum enhances the user experience by allowing users to add items to their givvum wish list right from third party sites without having to open up givvum.com. The extension provides several options that give users control over how items are added to their list. Using the extension has benefits for gift buyers as well; the extension will, on supported retailer sites, add product information such as the product name, image, and price. This makes it faster and easier to find the perfect gift for someone right from givvum.com.
